newsitem.title: FRANCE: SOCCER-LUIZAO SET TO JOIN PARIS ST GERMAIN.
newsitem.headline: SOCCER-LUIZAO SET TO JOIN PARIS ST GERMAIN.

text.p: French soccer club Paris St Germain, who already have two Brazilian players, were set to sign a third, young striker Luizao, a newspaper reported on Thursday.
French sports daily L'Equipe said Luizao's agents were in Paris to finalise a transfer deal.
Luizao, 21, a member of the Brazilian Olympic team who took bronze in Atlanta, currently plays for Brazilian first division Palmeiras.

If Luizao, whose full name is Luiz Carlos Goulart, was to join compatriots Rai and Leonardo at PSG, the Paris club would probably release Panamanian striker Julio Cesar Dely Valdes, for whom several clubs, including English premier league side Blackburn, have made offers.
